affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target, Point Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc: Rock spikes burst from the earth along a straight path. Enemy units are hurled into the air, then are stunned and take damage when they fall.
notes: The spikes move at 1600 units per second.
cmb:
100/120/145/170
12
lore: The Demon Witch exercises his demonic covenant, opening a fissure from hell.
name: lion_impale

affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc: Transforms an enemy unit into a harmless beast, with all special abilities disabled.
notes:
Instantly destroys illusions.
The target will have a base movement speed of 100, but buffs granting maximum movement speed won't be disabled.
Hex disables damage block and evasion.
cmb:
125/150/175/200
30/24/18/12
lore: Lion is compelled to share his transfiguration, twisting the essence of those who oppose him.
name: lion_voodoo

affects:
ABILITY: Channeled, Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc: CHANNELED - Absorbs the magical energies of a target enemy unit by taking mana from it every second.
attrib:
CHANNEL TIME: 5
MANA PER SECOND: 20/40/60/120
BREAK DISTANCE: 1200
cmb:
10/10/10/10
20/15/10/5
lore: Lesser magi are nothing more than a source of magical restoration for the Demon Witch.
name: lion_mana_drain

affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc:
Rips at an enemy unit, trying to turn it inside-out. Deals massive damage.
Upgradable with Aghanim's Scepter.
notes: Finger of Death has a 0.25 delay before the damage is applied after the spell is cast, allowing certain abilities to avoid the damage.
attrib:
DAMAGE: 600/725/850
SCEPTER DAMAGE: 725/875/1025
SCEPTER MANA COST: 200/420/625
SCEPTER COOLDOWN: 100/60/20
SCEPTER AOE: 200
cmb:
200/420/650
160/100/40
lore: Lion's disfigured hand is also the source of his greatest power, capable of flooding victims with malefic force.
name: lion_finger_of_death
